original: Berg, Adoif Göran Olof, postmästare, Stenungsund, f. 4/11/85 i Färnebo, Värml. 1., av stat:insp. Johan Gustajf B. o. Hanna Hallgren. G. 12 m. Johanna Maria Ljungberg. Barn: Kerstin Margareta f. 19. — Mog:ex. i Linköping 04. E. o. postexp. i västra distr. 05, postexp. i Lilla Edet 11, i Sunne 15 o. i Filipstad 19, postassist. i Filipstad 25, förste postassist. i Kristinehamn 33, postmäst. i Askersund 38, i Sunne 39, i Stenungsund sed. 45. Därjämte förordn. av längre o. kort. varaktigh. å oHka platser. GM åttonde storl.
translated: Berg, Adoif Göran Olof, postmaster, Stenungsund, b. 4/11/85 in Färnebo, Värmland. Firstborn of the state inspector Johan Gustaf B. and Hanna Hallgren. Married Johanna Maria Ljungberg in 1912. Children: Kerstin Margareta, born in 1919. Worked as a clerk in Linköping in 1904, deputy postmaster in the western district in 1905, postmaster in Lilla Edet in 1911, Sunne in 1915, and Filipstad in 1919. Became a senior post clerk in Filipstad in 1925, first assistant postmaster in Kristinehamn in 1933, postmaster in Askersund in 1938, Sunne in 1939, and Stenungsund since 1945. Additionally, appointed to various positions of longer and shorter durations. Awarded eighth major... (end of sentence unclear without additional context).
